forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of dense morning fog. Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of dense morning fog. Partly cloudy. High 64F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally clear. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 58F. SSW winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 3C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
